subject: Do you have any better solution for Exception in @Theory
msgSnippet: Hi I have a problem with Expected In @Theory . But unfortunately no one understands my problem or maybe I can t descript it. Any way, I want use @Theory with
messageBody:
Hi
I have a problem with "Expected In @Theory".
But unfortunately no one understands my problem or maybe
I can't descript it.
Any way, I want use @Theory with ability of @Test.
Like a @Test where can accept class of Exception
("@Test(expected = AnyClassException.class"))
, @Theory too accept an exception.
Of course I won't to use a "try catch" but I used a method which be
like an "expected" in @Test
Or method likes it.
After throws an Exception in case of
"@Test(expected = AnyClassException.class"
JUnit exits of test and it passed and I can't repeat it this test for
several times.
Do you have any better solution?
